name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
Week 1: Introducing each other, talking about semester break
Week 2: Lesson 9 - Auxiliary verb "muessen"
Week 3: Lesson 9 - Imperative, auxiliary verb "duerfen"
Week 4: Lesson 9 - Reading brochures, at a hotel reception
Week 5: Lesson 9 - Review, test
Week 6: Lesson 10 - Photo story (health)
Week 7: Lesson 10 - Human body, possessive pronouns
Week 8: Lesson 10 - Auxiliary verb "sollen", reading adverts
Week 9: Lesson 10 - Making appointments
Week 10: Lesson 10 - Review, test
Week 11: Lesson 11 - Photo story (in the city)
Week 12: Lesson 11 - Asking for directions, prepositions
Week 13: Lesson 11 - "Wo" and "wohin", announcements and time tables
Week 14: Lesson 11 - At the train station
Week 15: Lesson 11 - Review, test
Week 16: Lesson 12 - Photo story (the customer is king)
Week 17: Lesson 12 - Prepositions regarding time
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 10%
Tests after each lesson: 30%
Final exam: 50%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 2". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
